title: Save Me
description: Save me from my past.Save me from my fear.Save me from my pain.Save me from myself.The Stone brothers are the reason I can smile again. They are my only light in the drowning darkness. What started as friendship between them and me has become something more. They want me and I want them, too. But that wonâ€™t happen with my grief tearing me apart.Will I succumb to my grief and let it destroy me? Or will my guys be able to save me?***WARNING This is a reverse harem romance. Contains violence, graphic killing, foul language, and sexual content. Some parts may be triggering.***
author: Ashley N. Rostek
